comments:
Details:
Dataset which drop from library explorer to layout cannot be used

Setp:
1.New a library named "libA".
2.New a Sample datasource named d1 and dataset from CUSTOMERS named ds1.
3.Open a report design and include libA.
4.Drop the ds1 from library explorer to layout

Actual result:
An error message pop up.
